product_summary: Raw Query is a powerful AI-powered tool that allows you to interact with your databases using natural language. It makes it easy to query your data, insert new data, and update existing data. Raw Query is a great tool for developers, business intelligence professionals, and anyone else who needs to work with databases.
product_pros: Easy to use: Raw Query uses natural language, so you don't have to learn SQL or any other programming language.
Powerful: Raw Query can handle complex queries and even generate SQL code for you.
Time-saving: Raw Query can save you a lot of time by automating tasks and eliminating the need for manual data entry.
Secure: Raw Query never stores your actual data, so you can be sure that your data is safe.
Affordable: Raw Query offers a variety of pricing plans to fit your budget.
product_cons: Limited database support: Raw Query currently only supports Postgres, MySQL, and MariaDB.
Can be slow: Raw Query can be slow to process complex queries.
May not be suitable for all users: Raw Query may not be suitable for users who need to perform very complex data analysis.
Can be buggy: Raw Query is still in development and may contain bugs.
May not be able to handle all types of data: Raw Query may not be able to handle all types of data, such as images or videos.

product_usecases.details: Raw Query can be used to query data from your database using natural language. This is a great way to get quick insights into your data without having to write SQL code.
Raw Query can be used to insert new data into your database. This is a great way to add new customers, products, or other data to your database.
Raw Query can be used to update existing data in your database. This is a great way to correct errors, change customer information, or update product prices.
Raw Query can be used to generate reports from your data. This is a great way to get insights into your data and make informed decisions.
Raw Query can be used to automate tasks such as sending emails, creating reports, or updating data. This can save you a lot of time and effort.

product_toolfor.details: Raw Query can help developers save time by automating tasks and eliminating the need for manual data entry.
Raw Query can help business intelligence professionals get insights into their data and make informed decisions.
Raw Query can help data analysts analyze data and identify trends.

product_toolfor.target: Anyone who needs to work with databases
product_toolfor.details: Raw Query is a great tool for anyone who needs to work with databases, regardless of their skill level.
